verbs.description: At least six players on the Super Bowl champion team [V: have] said they ’ll decline to meet with President Trump .
[ARG0: At least six players on the Super Bowl champion team] have [V: said] [ARG1: they ’ll decline to meet with President Trump] .
At least six players on the Super Bowl champion team have said they [V: ’ll] decline to meet with President Trump .
At least six players on the Super Bowl champion team have said [ARG0: they] [ARGM-MOD: ’ll] [V: decline] [ARG1: to meet with President Trump] .
At least six players on the Super Bowl champion team have said [ARG0: they] ’ll decline to [V: meet] [ARG1: with President Trump] .
